name: Stick-Man Paper Battle-Field Jump-er Obstacle Course
name_original: Stick-Man Paper Battle-Field Jump-er Obstacle Course
description: Blast your way through the paper war zone. Army doodle stickman epic war empire fighting endless running game. Use your stickman sniper shooting aim and stickman battlefield game survival skills. We all love the classic army war games and army battle games fighting and strategy based alike. In this stickman army game you must use you war machine army of heroes jumping skills to survivet the obstacles. Simple 2d army infantry jumping game. If u like stickman games such as stickman killing games, stickman revenge games, or army men with commando defense battle skills you might like this game. Have fun!
